resources.string: This is a simple Todo App that allows user to enter, delete and update their tasks. The floating button with sign in it guides the user to a form.The Form is used for adding todo tasks. The form does not allow user to leave the title field blank.The user can navigate back to thehome page using back icon on the app bar. Swiping the todo list on either direction deletes the task.Clicking the item directs user to the update form. The app bar in the update page has a drop down menu. Share menu item in the Appbar of update page allows user to share the todo item with other device. Most of the features are self-explanatory
